messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Yes, this is North Las Vegas Tower. It looks like we have an aircraft on its way down.
Where is the aircraft?
Near Simmons and Kerry. We have a crash at Simmons and Kerry.
And it's an aircraft down?
Aircraft down.
What type of aircraft?
It's an experimental velocity. I believe there was only one person on board, but I can't confirm that.
Do you know if they got out?
It does not appear so right now.
How close is it to the North Las Vegas airport?
About one mile southeast, a mile and a half southeast of the airport.
Is it in the intersection?
I can't see from here.
Okay, if I can provide any other information, I'll forward it.
Control Center. We did an alert three, crash. It crashed into a house.
An experimental aircraft?
Yes.
I've seen a plane for North Las Vegas plane and it's in flames, but I'm trying to give you the cross street. I think it's off of Lake Mead and Martin Luther King.
Oh, my God, it hit a house?
Yes, it hit a house off of Lake Mead, and we're getting there now.
Okay, we're getting help there now. Can you provide the exact address if possible?
2313 Cambridge.
Is the house on fire?
Yes, the house is on fire. There are people in the house.
We have units responding, okay? Can I have your telephone number?
Oh, my God.
Okay, they are on their way. How are you spelling Cambridge?
C-A-M-B-R-I-D-G-E.
Thank you. We have units responding already.
Thank you.
Fire or medical? A huge explosion on Lake Mead between Tonopah and Simmons. Huge explosion just happened, and the flames are just shooting up.
Can you see what it is?
I can't see what it is because the building's in the way, but there was just a huge explosion.
All right, we have units responding. Thank you.
Fire or medical? Are you near Lake Mead and Simmons area?
Yeah.
We're on the way. We already have it, okay?
Okay, thank you.
Fire or medical? There's a huge fire going on across the street from me. The house is on fire.
Can you see it?
Yes, it's coming out of the front now, too. It's horrible.
We just had a plane crash there.
Oh, maybe that's it. Oh, my God. There are some older people that live in that house.
We are getting reports from all over. We'll be there shortly.
Fire or medical? There is a house on fire, it's huge.
What's the address, please?
I don't know, I'm driving down the street and I can see it over a wall. It's on Cambridge Heights, off of Lake Mead and Simmons area.
All right, looks like we have units on the way.
Yeah, and I mean, it's raging.
You see a house on fire?
Yes, like the whole roof is on fire.
We have someone on the way. Thank you.
Fire or medical? We have a house that just exploded, it's like six houses away from me.
We had an aircraft that went down.
Okay, it landed in a house.
Do you know if anyone was in that house?
I don't know, I'm assuming so.
What's your address?
It's seven houses away from my house.
Okay, we have help on the way. Please keep everyone away from it.
Okay, thank you.
